duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in an acute care setting, including monitoring vital signs, administering medication, and documenting patient information.
Utilize critical thinking skills to make clinical decisions and perform diagnostic testing as required.
Administer medication as ordered, ensuring the accurate dosage and patient safety.
Demonstrate compassion and empathy while attending to the emotional and physical needs of patients in a critical care environment.
Manage time efficiently to prioritize patient care and maintain accurate clinical documentation.
Pay attention to detail to ensure the highest quality of care and patient safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) or Associate's Degree in Nursing (ADN) with RN licensure
